Ward Boundaries

General Election Date: May 2, 2026

All voting will be conducted at the City Council Chambers located at 200 W. Liveoak, Coleman, Texas

The May 2, 2026, General Election will be held at the Coleman City Hall / City Council Chambers, located at 200 W. Liveoak. Filing for a place on the ballot is set by state statute and will run from January 14 to February 13, 2026. Filing packets may be picked up at City Hall. Contact the City Secretary at (325) 625-4116, for more information.

Place 1 - North Ward Current Office Holder - Tracy Rankin
Place 4 - South Ward Current Office Holder - Monte Sides
  • January 1, 2026 - First day to apply for a ballot by mail.
  • January 14, 2026 - First day to have your name placed on the ballot.
  • February 13, 2026 - Last day to have your name placed on the ballot.
  • February 17, 2026 - Last day to file a Declaration of Write-in Candidacy.
  • April 2, 2026 - Last day to register to vote.
  • April 20, 2026 - Last day to apply for a ballot by mail.

Candidates for Council Place 1 - North Ward

Tracy Rankin - Incumbent

Candidates for Council Place 4 - South Ward

Kelton Matthews kelton.matthews@outlook.com

The City of Coleman is an Equal Opportunity Employer; Supporter of Equal Housing Opportunity; Citizen Participation; The Fair Housing Policy; and, The Americans with Disabilities Act.
